label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_003
content:
## 2024-03-18 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 67
- Active: 67
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 5
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 0

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 18
- Mid Dose: 17
- High Dose: 16
- Placebo: 16

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 24.8
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 14.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 38.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 65.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 45.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 11.9
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 48.1
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 24.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 72.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 106.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 77.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 14.5
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 63.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 30.5
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 95.5
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 152.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 108.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 29.4
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 10.7
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 2.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 4.6
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 5.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 7.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 6.9

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 51.7
- Erythema Percentage: 14.6
- Swelling Percentage: 7.8
- Induration Percentage: 10.0
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 25.5

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 18.2
- Fatigue Percentage: 32.7
- Myalgia Percentage: 25.9
- Headache Percentage: 17.3
- Chills Percentage: 14.8

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 8.9
- WBC (K) SD: 1.9
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 28.7
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 6.8
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 62.2
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.2
- Platelets (K) Mean: 216
- Platelets (K) SD: 39
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 6.3
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.8
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.3

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-0303, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0346, Description: fever, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0386, Description: injection site pain, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- Serum sample aliquoting completed for 25 subjects
- Serum sample aliquoting completed for 19 subjects

### Notes
- Week 3: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 67 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
